info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 5:30PM EDT until June 22 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WESTMORELAND AND NORTHEASTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES... At 530 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ligonier, or 7 miles southeast of Latrobe, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Latrobe, McChesneytown-Loyalhanna, Lawson Heights, Ligonier, Seven Springs, Calumet-Norvelt, Youngstown, Laurel Mountain, Donegal, Champion, Jones Mills, and Laurel Mountain State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
